snippet: Calling itself a rights organization, Moscow Shield seeks to root out unregistered immigrant workers, especially those from former Soviet republics.
abstract: Group calling itself Moscow Shield has made its mission to root out groups of unregistered immigrant workers in Moscow, particularly those from former Soviet republics, and turn them over to police for for deportation; group, like other nationalist and patriotic youth organizations, is giving auxiliary support to Russia’s crackdown on immigrant workers and has been given unusual latitude by police.
lead_paragraph: Calling itself a rights organization, Moscow Shield seeks to root out unregistered immigrant workers, especially those from former Soviet republics.

headline.main: Russian Youth Group With a Mission: Sniffing Out Illegal Migrants
headline.print_headline: Russian Youth Group With a Mission: Sniffing Out Illegal Migrants
